DOC.brief_title: Effects Of PF-02545920 On Ketamine-Induced Abnormal Prefrontal Brain Response To Associative Learning In Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study terminate November 2 , 2012 due reassessment likelihood study meeting scientific objective light data investigational drug obtain another clinical study . The decision terminate trial base safety concern .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 45 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Right hand determined handedness questionnaire . Able read write English primary language . Female subject pregnant breastfeeding . Any evidence significant psychosislike symptom . Known sensitivity ketamine .
